meanings.definition: The state of being without air.
meanings.sent1: The astronaut felt the airlessness of space as he floated in his suit.
meanings.sent2: The deep sea creatures have adapted to the airlessness of the ocean depths.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal felt the airlessness of the room as it slowly deflated.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house exuded an eerie airlessness that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The claustrophobic elevator emphasized the airlessness of the confined space.

meanings.sent1: The underground bunker had an oppressive airlessness that made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The high-altitude climbers experienced the airlessness of the thin mountain air.
meanings.sent3: The deflated balloon had a comical airlessness that made it look like a sad clown.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned attic was filled with an airlessness that seemed to suffocate any sound.
meanings.sent5: The sealed jar highlighted the airlessness inside, preserving the contents for years.
